TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext : System.Threading.SynchronizationContext, IDisposable
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext extends System.Threading.SynchronizationContext implements class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: Provides a synchronization context for the Windows Forms application model.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool AutoInstall { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the is installed when a control is created.
Docs.value: if the is installed; otherwise, . The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext.AutoInstall%2A> property determines whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> is installed when a control is created, or when a message loop is started.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Threading.SynchronizationContext CreateCopy() cil managed

Docs.returns: A copy of the synchronization context.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

Docs.summary: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>. The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> in an unusable state. After calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> was occupying. For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
> [!NOTE] > Always call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>. Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Post (System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback d, object state);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Post(class System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback d, object state) cil managed

Docs.param: The object passed to the delegate.
Docs.summary: Dispatches an asynchronous message to a synchronization context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext.Post%2A> method starts an asynchronous request to post a message.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Send (System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback d, object state);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Send(class System.Threading.SendOrPostCallback d, object state) cil managed

Docs.param: The object passed to the delegate.
Docs.summary: Dispatches a synchronous message to a synchronization context

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the destination thread no longer exists or the value of its <xref:System.Threading.Thread.IsAlive%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext.Send%2A> method raises an <xref:System.ComponentModel.InvalidAsynchronousStateException>. It is up to the caller to determine what further action to take.

Docs.exception: The destination thread no longer exists.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void Uninstall() cil managed

Docs.summary: Uninstalls the currently installed and replaces it with the previously installed context.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the previously installed <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext> is `null`, the current context is set to `null`.
If the currently installed synchronization context is not a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WindowsFormsSynchronizationContext>, this method does nothing.
